Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic

Class DefaultLoggerFacade

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.basic.AbstractLoggerFacade
chav1961.purelib.basic.DefaultLoggerFacade
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoggerFacade, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class DefaultLoggerFacade
extends AbstractLoggerFacade

This class is an implementation of LoggerFacade interface for the java.util.logging package.

This class is not thread-safe.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
